about.label: ABOUT US

seo.brief: EM Taxi is your private chauffeur and premium transport partner in Morocco since 2009. Airport transfers, business, events — Mercedes and BMW fleet, 24/7.
seo.p1: EM Taxi is your private chauffeur and premium transport partner in Morocco. Since 2009, EM Taxi Touristique has been offering luxury transport in Casablanca, Marrakech, Rabat and across Morocco.
seo.p2: Book a private chauffeur for airport transfers, business travel, events and special occasions. Our Mercedes and BMW fleet provides comfortable, punctual premium transport, available 24/7.
seo.p3: Services: airport transfers with flight tracking, professional and corporate transport, chauffeur for events and weddings, on-demand service for tourist visits. Transparent pricing and Standard, Business and Premium packages.
seo.p4: EM Taxi - Private Chauffeur & Premium Transport Morocco: experienced drivers, high-end vehicles and a commitment to quality for all your travel in Morocco. Easy booking by phone or online form.
seo.p5: Whether you travel for business or leisure, choosing EM Taxi means reliability, comfort and professionalism. Contact us to book your private chauffeur or get a personalised quote for premium transport in Morocco.
seo.p6: Book by phone on 06 72 72 87 06 or via the contact form. EM Taxi - Private Chauffeur & Premium Transport Morocco: your reference for luxury transport in Casablanca, Marrakech, Rabat, Fès and Moroccan airports.

team.description: Rigorously trained, licensed and checked drivers. Discretion, punctuality and service excellence guaranteed.

excellence.title: Excellence in
excellence.description: Since 2009, EM TAXI TOURISTIQUE has been the preferred choice for high-end transportation services. We combine professional expertise and unwavering commitment to excellence.
excellence.quote: Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, we are committed to making every ride a smooth and luxurious experience.

security.title: Safety First
security.description: Licensed, insured and regularly trained drivers. Your safety is our absolute priority.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Impeccable vehicles, professional service and attention to detail for an exceptional experience.

reference.title: Industry Reference
reference.description: Thousands of satisfied customers and consistent 5-star reviews attest to our excellence.
